Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Musical and cultural development of popular music in the United States from the 1840s to the present.

Course Description.text: Rise of rock music to prominence, and its impact on audience reception. No musical background required.

MUH2017H - Honors Survey of Rock Music.name: MUH2017H - Honors Survey of Rock Music

Course Description.text: Rock music, 1950s to present, with emphasis on cultural and musical meaning. With Honors content

Course Description.text: Country music and its historical developments from the 1920s to present.

MUH3633 - Music in the United States.name: MUH3633 - Music in the United States

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites

Course Description.text: Music of the United States of America from pre-Revolutionary times to present. Includes vernacular, jazz, popular, and art music traditions indigenous to the USA.
